<img style="float: right;" src="l.jpg" width=30%>

* is a web page that was created with the objective of liberalizing economic and financial data. 

* offers a large amount of data ready to be downloaded and used for your project or modeling. 
* also offers to visualize some macro indicators in a dashboard format.

* is completely open source and free.

* does not collect your data and will never send you ads.
